page.title: 16THE GARDEN SHOP.
page.content: The most popular seed is the lettuce and the carrots. The vegetable seeds are all in alphabet order from b-beetroot to t-tomato. Also they sell flower seeds from a for Allysum to z for Zinnia. Seeds come from Bristol and from Lincolnshire. Vegetable seeds come from Venezuela. Potato seeds from Scotland by train. Cut flowers come from all over the world. Children buy flowers for mums,husbands for wives. Flowers are bought for churches. They are bought for Mother's day. Flowers are made into bouquets. They are made up in a special room at the back of the shop. The shop sells garden ornaments. They work long hours.Before Christmas they started work at 4.00a.m. and finished at 7.30p.m. On Mother's Day they delivered 172 bouquets and pot plants.
